data.comment: The match is underway at Mac3Park Stadion.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Mario Gotze.
In the minute 18, Goal! Eindhoven extend their lead to 0-2 through Cody Gakpo.
That's a fine assist from Philipp Max.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Zwolle.
In the minute 31, Reza Ghoochannejhad (Zwolle) has missed a penalty!
It's now 0-3 in Zwolle as Donyell Malen scores for Eindhoven.
Great play from Cody Gakpo to set up the goal.
In the minute 43, Dean Huiberts is booked for the home team.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Mustafa Saymak is replacing Destan Bajselmani for the home team.
Zwolle make their second substitution with Slobodan Tedic replacing Reza Ghoochannejhad.
Bram Van Polen (Zwolle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 61, Pablo Rosario for Eindhoven has been booked by Danny Makkelie and receives a first yellow card.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a third substitution, with Mike Van Duinen replacing Clint Leemans.
Chukwunonso Madueke is on a sub for Mauro Junior for Eindhoven.
In the minute 67, The away team have replaced Mario Gotze with Mohammed Ihattaren. This is the second substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
The home team replace Dean Huiberts with Eliano Reijnders.
Eindhoven's Ibrahim Sangare has been booked in Zwolle.
In the minute 87, Adrian Fein is replacing Ibrahim Sangare for Eindhoven at Mac3Park Stadion.
That's full-time at Mac3Park Stadion. The final score is 0-3.
Joel Piroe is on a sub for Donyell Malen for Eindhoven.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's fifth substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with Jorrit Hendrix replacing Pablo Rosario.
